ca.corefacility.gview.map.controllers
Class PlotStyleController

java.lang.Object
  ca.corefacility.gview.map.controllers.Controller
      ca.corefacility.gview.map.controllers.PlotStyleController

public class PlotStyleController
extends Controller

This class is responsible for controlling all access to the plot style by GUI elements.

Author:
Eric Marinier
